titles.title: Great Lakes Icebreaker Replacement Act
A bill to authorize appropriations for the design, acquisition, and construction of a combined buoy tender-icebreaker to replace icebreaking capacity on the Great Lakes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 5/12/2009--Introduced. Great Lakes Icebreaker Replacement Act - Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of Homeland Security for necessary expenses of the Coast Guard relating to the design, acquisition, and construction of a combined buoy tender-icebreaker to replace icebreaking capacity on the Great Lakes.
